name: Metal Scavenger
description:
In this game you play as a robot and clean up the electronic wastes in abandoned buildings, with your plier and screwdriver, you maintain and upgrade yourself with the electronic waste, but if you wear out too much, you'll turn off(lose), you also have to be careful not to stay in the buildings too late, wild beasts will come to tear you up.

Disclaimer : 

I did not have time to implement a pause screen

Controls :

Movements : array keys, wasd, dpad

Plier : J/Z/A

Screwdriver : K/X/B

Some buttons may require pressing with mouse due to my terrible time management I don't have the time to fix it AAAAAAAAAAAa
